ygData.subject: Re: What is the Illegible cantrip for
ygData.msgSnippet: This one says it is a Lore Item, and I tried to sell it and no merchant would buy it. ... From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@trane.com] Sent: Friday, May
ygData.messageBody:
This one says it is a Lore Item, and I tried to sell it and no merchant
would buy it.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 10:59 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] What is the Illegible cantrip for


From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>

Well my enchanter friend was able to use it. At least she told me to
give her all the cantrip spells I found. I also sold one to a vendor,
so its not a quest item (it wasn't a lore item).

> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]

>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>

> it....only for wiz and mages perhaps?
>
> John Zwanenburg
